mapper.insert: INSERT INTO license5(licenseType, productType, customerName, businessName, additionalInformation, macAddress, issueDate, expirationDays, igriffinAgentCount, tos5AgentCount, tos2AgentCount, dbmsCount, networkCount, aixCount, hpuxCount, solarisCount, linuxCount, windowsCount, managerOsType, managerDbmsType, country, productVersion, licenseFilePath, serialNumber, requester, licenseIssuanceRegistrant, licenseIssuanceRegistrationDate) VALUES(#{licenseTypeView}, #{productTypeView}, #{customerNameView}, #{businessNameView}, #{additionalInformationView}, #{macAddressView}, #{issueDateView}, #{expirationDaysView}, #{igriffinAgentCountView}, #{tos5AgentCountView}, #{tos2AgentCountView}, #{dbmsCountView}, #{networkCountView}, #{aixCountView}, #{hpuxCountView}, #{solarisCountView}, #{linuxCountView}, #{windowsCountView}, #{managerOsTypeView}, #{managerDbmsTypeView}, #{countryView}, #{productVersionView}, #{licenseFilePathView}, #{serialNumberView}, #{requesterView}, #{licenseIssuanceRegistrant}, #{licenseIssuanceRegistrationDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE license5 SET licenseType=#{licenseTypeView}, productType=#{productTypeView}, customerName=#{customerNameView}, businessName=#{businessNameView}, additionalInformation=#{additionalInformationView}, macAddress=#{macAddressView}, issueDate=#{issueDateView}, expirationDays=#{expirationDaysView}, igriffinAgentCount=#{igriffinAgentCountView}, tos5AgentCount=#{tos5AgentCountView}, tos2AgentCount=#{tos2AgentCountView}, dbmsCount=#{dbmsCountView}, networkCount=#{networkCountView}, aixCount=#{aixCountView}, hpuxCount=#{hpuxCountView}, solarisCount=#{solarisCountView}, linuxCount=#{linuxCountView}, windowsCount=#{windowsCountView}, managerOsType=#{managerOsTypeView}, country=#{countryView}, productVersion=#{productVersionView}, licenseFilePath=#{licenseFilePathView}, serialNumber=#{serialNumberView}, requester=#{requesterView}, licenseIssuanceModifier=#{licenseIssuanceModifier}, licenseIssuanceModifiedDate=#{licenseIssuanceModifiedDate} WHERE licenseKeyNum = #{licenseKeyNum};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM license5 WHERE serialNumber = #{serialNumber};
